author: Trish Deseine
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4. Put the tomatoes into a gratin dish and season with salt and pepper.  In a bowl, beat the eggs and the yolk with the milk and cream. Add the sifted flour and the Parmesan and season to taste. Pour over the tomatoes and bake for about 30 minutes, until puffed and golden-brown. Serve with a crisp green salad.
ingredients: 300g/10½ oz slow-roast or sun-blushed tomatoes, drained and chopped (see Tip),  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste,  4 free-range eggs plus 1 egg yolk,  300ml/½ pint milk,  400ml/14fl oz single cream,  2 tbsp plain flour, sifted,  150g/5oz Parmesan (or vegetarian alternative), freshly grated
